description.en:
HAPY Coin is a blockchain project suitable for donation activities. HAPY Coin has built a Happy Sharing ecosystem with 10,000 users.

Happy Sharing, as a global sharing platform, has the same profit model as other platforms through investment and interest charges, but there are several points that are different from the existing income-based Wallet. The donated HAPY token on happy sharing system are checkable by all users. Besides, happy sharing is not a centralized platform managed by the company, but a perfect decentralized blockchain sharing platform based on the SERO mainnet platform.

Users of Happy sharing system use the infrastructure of the world to share various goods belonging to the Happy sharing ecosystem, which is a solution for sharing donations. 100% of all donations or proceeds generated by Happy sharing are shared in the community.
